text: Update: I've got the email template mostly finished. Emails hate CSS, so there's been a lot of fudging and back-and-forth from mail browser to editor. The mailer script is almost done too. I just have one more piece on that to finish, then I can build a weekly task to run the script.
I've finished this week's hours on Chronos, and switching to LEGO/OMSI for the rest of the week.
